definitions.definition: A dead body , especially that of a human as opposed to an animal.
The dead body of any animal with flesh ; the dead body of a vertebrate ; a carcass .
A human body in general, whether living or dead.

main_definition: A dead body , especially that of a human as opposed to an animal.
secondary_definitions: The dead body of any animal with flesh ; the dead body of a vertebrate ; a carcass .
( archaic , sometimes derogatory ) A human body in general, whether living or dead.
